full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB CHEN THANG STONG RGYAL PO'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG MTSON GYI 'JIGS PA ZHI BA'I BDEN TSIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES MDO KHAMS ME NYAG GI YUL DU GA-YUL 'KHRUGS RGYUN MI 'CHAD PA SUS KYANG 'DUM PAR MA NUS PA'I TSE, RJE GRUB THOB CHEN PO PHYOGS DER PHEBS NAS THUGS BSKYED MDZAD, BDEN TSIG GSUNGS SHING ME TOG 'THOR BA TZAM GYIS THAMS CAD KYI PHRAG DOG DANG ZHE LDANG GI GDUG SEMS THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING GA-YUL 'KHRUGS RGYUN CHAD, LO LEGS SKYA RGYAL SOGS BKRA SHIS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BYUNG BA'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG BYIN RLABS CAN NO,, ,,)
